name: secure-ai-chat
description: A secure AI chat application with end-to-end encryption and privacy features

scripts.check: npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.check:ci: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.check:node: node -e "const v=process.versions.node; if(v!=='25.2.1'){console.error('❌ Node 25.2.1 required. Current:', v); process.exit(1)} else {console.log('✅ Node OK:', v)}"
scripts.pre-push: npm run check:node && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.test: echo 'No tests configured. Run npm run smoke for smoke tests.'
